metadata.synopsis: After the player interferes with their game, the githyanki kid shoves the player with her Mage Hand and tells them to get lost.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1314; -2; -806 in CRE_Main_A, and use the shove action on the box the kids are playing with.(There are other ways to trigger this dialog)

1.speaker: Zel'i
1.text: We don't want to play with you, k'chakhi!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: ke-CHOCK-ee (means "idiot")NodeContext: Getting angry now

2.speaker: Zel'i
2.text: You're ruining it! Go away, shka'keth!
2.context: InternalNodeContext: SHKA-keth (means "asshole")NodeContext: Shrill, childish anger
